snippet: In a blow to its image, the U.K. Independence Party has suspended its general secretary after he was accused of sexual harassment.
abstract: Roger Bird, senior party official in UK Independence Party, has been accused of sexually harassing prospective parliamentary candidate Natasha Bolter; scandal threatens UKIP's efforts to brand itself as defender of traditional British habits and values.
lead_paragraph: In a blow to its image, the U.K. Independence Party has suspended its general secretary after he was accused of sexual harassment.

headline.main: UKIP, a British Party That Stresses Values, Faces a Sex Scandal
headline.print_headline: British Party That Stresses Values Faces a Sex Scandal
